page.title: 09HASLAR R.N.HOSPITAL
page.content: This hospital is very famous and has taken patients from every major battle and war since the middle of the eighteenth century, from Trafalgar to Vietnam, Northern Island to the Falklands. It is situated very close to the sea wall between H.M.S.Dolphin and H.M.Detention Centre Haslar. Although the hospital is mainly for serving officers and men of the Royal Navy and their families it has since 1948 treated N.H.S. patients and now povides beds for many civilians. The building is of outstanding architectural interest and recent modifications have provided more beds ane staff accomodation as well as a new main entrance.
